string.value: #p1061011# said #b#p1061012##k will know about the Bowman's ultimate skill. At last! I'm on my way there now! \n\n#t4161029# #b#c4161029# / 1
#p1061012# was aware of the book and gave me the answers I needed. I see that my journey has just begun, but I will gain tremendous power should I see it through to completion. Onward!
You are looking for someone who knows about advanced Bowmen techniques. Then go to see #b#p1061012##k. You may find more information!
He has his own identity and way of doing things. I believe he talked about #bThe Bowman's Ultimate Skill#k.
Is it you that has searched the land for me? I've heard of you from #p1061011# ! It's good to know that there are some people still looking for me. I haven't had visitors for a quite a while...

#bThe Bowman's Ultimate Skill#k? #bTraining Fields for the Ultimate Skill?#k And the book...That book is...! That's it! I can't believe you brought this book! I've been uninspired and bored for hundreds of years, but no longer! This book reminds me of the days of my youth...and the battles I fought! I thought that this book was lost forever! It is you who has returned inspiration to #p1061012#. I'm so happy!
Haven't you found #p1061012#? It's easy to recognize #p1061012#. He's...well, not quite there these days...
It used to have meaning...huh? What brought you here? Book? What are you talking about?
